column1: #text=Last night , I had to bake a cake for my son 's birthday party .
#text=I decided to go online to find a recipe to follow that a lot of people seemed to like .
#text=I found a great chocolate cake recipe and printed it out .
#text=Once it was done being printed , I brought it into the kitchen and started gathering supplies .
#text=Among the supplies were eggs , flour , sugar , and more .
#text=First thing 's first : I had to set the oven for 350 degrees .
#text=The best way to follow a baking recipe is by adding the dry ingredients like flour and baking powder together first .
#text=Once those are mixed together , the wet ingredients are mixed together and added to the dry ingredients .
#text=I followed the measurements in the recipe and mixed together the cake batter .
#text=I grabbed a rectangle cake pan , oiled it and shook some flour around the edges .
#text=I poured the cake into the pan and put it into the oven for about 18 minutes .
#text=When I thought it was done , I checked the cake with a toothpick by putting it in the middle .
#text=The toothpick came out clean , without any batter on it , so I knew the cake was done .
#text=I let it cool for a few hours , added icing , and enjoyed it at the birthday party .
